org.trianacode.taskgraph.service

Interface SchedulerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Scheduler

    public interface SchedulerInterface
    The Interface that all schedulers must implement. This allows us to easily "bolt" in new scheduler algorithms should we wish.
